inspector.componentDisabled: The component is disabled and will be ignored during the build. Check the checkbox for the component if you want to enable it.
inspector.referenceMaterial.tooltip: Settings will be copied from the material specified here.
inspector.ignoreMaterials.tooltip: The settings of the material set here will not be copied.
inspector.properties.tooltip: The properties entered here will be copied.
inspector.menuName.tooltip: This is the name of the menu displayed on VRChat. If nothing is entered, it will be the same as the object name.
inspector.parameterName.tooltip: Name of the parameter used in VRChat. If nothing is entered, it will be the same as the object name.
inspector.menuParameterName.tooltip: This is the name of the menu and the parameter used in VRChat. If nothing is entered, it will be the same as the object name.
inspector.parentOverride.tooltip: The menu will be placed in the folder specified here. If nothing is specified, the menu will be placed in the parent MenuFolder component if it exists, or in the root if not.
inspector.parentOverrideMA.tooltip: If you specify MA Menu Item here, the menu will be generated with Modular Avatar instead of this tool. Settings such as icons and menu names are from MA Menu Item.
inspector.parentOverrideMAInfo: Menu settings are managed by MA Menu Item. If you want to change the icon etc., please edit the MA Menu Item.
inspector.icon.tooltip: This is the icon displayed on the VRChat menu.
inspector.folderContentsCircularReferenc: Circular reference detected. Please change the parent folder.
inspector.isSave.tooltip: If you turn this on, the state will be saved even if the avatar is loaded.
inspector.isLocalOnly.tooltip: If you turn this on, objects will only be turned on and off from your perspective.
inspector.objects: Object to toggle (Multiple added in D&D here)
inspector.objects.tooltip: The object specified here will be turned on or off when the menu is activated. You can also add multiple objects at once by dragging and dropping them here. When selecting multiple objects, click the lock icon at the top right of the Inspector to prevent the screen from switching. If you want to go back to switching screens, click the lock icon again to unlock it.
inspector.blendShapeModifiers.tooltip: The BlendShape specified here will be set to the specified value when the menu is activated.
inspector.skinnedMeshRenderer.tooltip: The mesh specified here will be controlled. If nothing is specified, all meshes will be controlled.
inspector.name: Name
inspector.materialReplacers.tooltip: Materials of the mesh specified here will be set to the specified material when the menu is enabled.
inspector.materialPropertyModifiers.tool: The material properties specified here will be set to the specified values when the menu is activated.
inspector.renderers.tooltip: The mesh specified here will be controlled.
inspector.clips.tooltip: By setting AnimationClip here, you can animate properties that cannot be changed with lilycalInventory. The value is copied from the first frame of the AnimationClip.
inspector.flipToggle.tooltip: If you turn this on, the avatar's state will change when the menu is disabled.
inspector.flipToggleNonZeroWarning: Flipping toggle may result in unintended states if synchronization fails.
inspector.defaultCostume.tooltip: When you reset your avatar, the costume set here will be selected.
inspector.defaultCostumeNonZeroWarning: Setting a value other than 0 may result in unintended states if synchronization fails.
inspector.defaultFrameValue.tooltip: When you reset your avatar, the frame value will be the value you set here.
inspector.frames.tooltip: Set the properties to be manipulated with Radial Puppet. Frames in between are interpolated.
inspector.frameValue.tooltip: Keyframe value. 0 when Radial Puppet is at its minimum, 1 when it is at its maximum.
inspector.previewWarn: If you want to turn the object attached to this component on or off, please stop the preview.
inspector.commentInformation: Please enter the language code in a format such as "en-us". If there is no corresponding language code, the top text will be displayed first.
dialog.error.processfailed: Avatar build was canceled because an error occurred during processing.
dialog.error.parameterover: The number of parameters to synchronize exceeds the upper limit. Please reduce the number of parameters by making parameters local-only or consolidating operations.
dialog.error.menuNameEmpty: The menu name is empty. Please set a name.
dialog.error.menuNameDuplication: Duplicate menu name. Please change the name.
dialog.error.parameterDuplication: Duplicate parameter name. Please change the name.
dialog.error.dresserSettingsDuplication: There are multiple AutoDresserSettings. Please enable only one.
dialog.error.defaultDuplication: Multiple objects with AutoDresser are turned on. Please check only one so that the tool can set the initial value.
dialog.error.allObjectOff: All objects with AutoDresser are turned off. Please check only one so that the tool can set the initial value.
dialog.error.avatarRootNofFound: Avatar root object not found. Make sure that the object is inside the avatar and that the avatar has an AvatarDescriptor attached.
dialog.error.menuCircularReference: MenuFolder has a circular reference. Please change the parent folder.
dialog.error.menuMADuplication: MA Menu Item is referenced by multiple components. Make sure to create one MA Menu Item for each component.
